Articles.Content:
Hi I am Katve from Finland and I am 16 years old.

I found about KSP half year ago when I downloaded old demo and get hooked to it. Watched many videos from YouTube, but neither dad's credit card or my credit card supports Paypal so I leaved it for videos and demo. January of this year I downloaded Steam, bought some games via it by buying steam wallet codes from local Gamestop and when I discovered that KSP was on Steam I decided that I will buy it and yesterday I bought it.

I have already achieved:

-Orbit with 3 Satellites

-3 manned flight to orbit

-Flying space plane

-EVA in orbit

And I tried for 45 min to dock, but I couldn't figure out how it should be done. Trying more today and hoping for docking.
Welcome to the forums! I hope you choose to stick around
